content.html: I hate to 'pile on' online. Confrontation makes me nauseous. But at this point it's less of an orchestrated pile on and more akin to being involuntarily buried in negativity. I'm just trying to get my head above the mountain of feedback received and plot a course forward.
content.value:
I hate to 'pile on' online. Confrontation makes me nauseous. 

But at this point it's less of an orchestrated pile on and more akin to being involuntarily buried in negativity.

I'm just trying to get my head above the mountain of feedback received and plot a course forward.
